It features a martini-like API with much better performance, up to 40 times faster thanks to "},{"type":"LINK/LINK","data":{"href":"https://github.com/julienschmidt/httprouter","openInNewWindow":false},"children":[{"text":"httprouter"}]},{"text":". If you need performance and good productivity, you will love Gin."}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":"In this section we will walk through what Gin is, what problems it solves, and how it can help your project."}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":"Or, if you are ready to use Gin in to your project, visit the "},{"type":"LINK/LINK","data":{"href":"https://gin-gonic.com/docs/quickstart/","openInNewWindow":false},"children":[{"text":"Quickstart"}]},{"text":"."}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":" "}]},{"type":"HEADINGS/HEADING-FIVE","children":[{"text":"Features Fast"}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":"Radix tree based routing, small memory foot print. No reflection. Predictable API performance."}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":" "}]},{"type":"HEADINGS/HEADING-FIVE","children":[{"text":"Middleware support"}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":"An incoming HTTP request can be handled by a chain of middlewares and the final action. For example: Logger, Authorization, GZIP and finally post a message in the DB."}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":" "}]},{"type":"HEADINGS/HEADING-FIVE","children":[{"text":"Crash-free"}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":"Gin can catch a panic occurred during a HTTP request and recover it. This way, your server will be always available. As an example - it’s also possible to report this panic to Sentry!"}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":" "}]},{"type":"HEADINGS/HEADING-FIVE","children":[{"text":"JSON validation"}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":"Gin can parse and validate the JSON of a request - for example, checking the existence of required values."}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":" "}]},{"type":"HEADINGS/HEADING-FIVE","children":[{"text":"Routes grouping"}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":"Organize your routes better. Authorization required vs non required, different API versions… In addition, the groups can be nested unlimitedly without degrading performance."}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":" "}]},{"type":"HEADINGS/HEADING-FIVE","children":[{"text":"Error management"}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":"Gin provides a convenient way to collect all the errors occurred during a HTTP request. Eventually, a middleware can write them to a log file, to a database and send them through the network."}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":" "}]},{"type":"HEADINGS/HEADING-FIVE","children":[{"text":"Rendering built-in"}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":"Gin provides an easy to use API for JSON, XML and HTML rendering."}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":" "}]},{"type":"HEADINGS/HEADING-FIVE","children":[{"text":"Extendable"}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":"Creating a new middleware is so easy, just check out the sample codes."}]},{"type":"PARAGRAPH/PARAGRAPH","data":{"align":"left"},"children":[{"text":" "}]}]}},"rows":[],"inline":null}]}],"inline":null,"dataI18n":{}},{"id":"c000f3","size":2,"plugin":{"id":"ory/editor/core/content/spacer","version":1},"dataI18n":{"default":{"height":24}},"rows":[],"inline":null}]}]}
